Struct Transition

Namespace
Automata.Core
Assembly
Automata.Core.dll

Represents a non-epsilon transition in an automaton, defined by a starting state, a symbol, and an ending state.

public readonly record struct Transition : IComparable<Transition>, IEquatable<Transition>
Implements

Represents a non-epsilon transition in an automaton, defined by a starting state, a symbol, and an ending state.

Parameters

FromState int

The state from which the transition starts.

Symbol int

The symbol that triggers the transition.

ToState int

The state to which the transition goes.
